newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Volga-Dnepr delivers cargo for Star Wars film.
newsitem.headline: Volga-Dnepr delivers cargo for Star Wars film.

text.p: Russian cargo airline AO Volga-Dnepr has delivered from London to Tunisia 100 tonnes of equipment for shooting George Lucas' new Star Wars film, a company spokesman said on Friday.
"An Antonov An-124 freighter delivered a cargo earlier this week, including a mock spacecraft and other equipment for shooting the film," the spokesman told Reuters. He gave no further details.

Ulyanovsk-based Volga-Dnepr currently operates 12 cargo planes -- seven An-124s, three Ilyushin Il-76TDs, one An-12 and one An-32. It uses a Yakovlev Yak-40 jet for regular passenger flights between Ulyanovsk and Moscow.
